rComments: Unlike Jenny Lynn, Ariane Helou is not a forgiving grader and holds her students to very high expectations. Latin courses at UCSC are generally fast paced, but Ariane takes the technicalities of the language so seriously that unless you have high school experience with Latin language expect 6+ hours of studying just to earn a passing grade.

Professor Helou is a great teacher with a fun and energetic personality. Her class is hard but she is very helpful and very kind. Go to her office hours and she is sure to help you with anything that you need. Highly recommend!
